=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 day -
2 days || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 16 hours -
1 day 8 hours || 192 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 10 hours 40 mins -
21 hours 20 mins || 128 mulch |}
